this is hands down the worst app ever. it took 4 hours to download although i have good wifi. me and my animal crossing friend tom nook were so excited to use this app but it took too long. the main reason i downloaded this app because i wanted to support our rapist president. only to open the app to see cheap orange spray tan??? why do i need to look like 2014 laughing orange 🍊? the next day i woke up to find a rotten orange stalking me. once i opened the app again it started playing music that made cockroaches come out (by the way i have a phobia of bugs) the cockroaches proceeded to attack my brother and my cat died. all because of donald 🍊 trump. the cockroaches killed my cat and burnt his body while we were watching and crying. the cockroaches called their rat friends which ended up eating all our food. due to covid we can’t get any food so we called the over some pigs to help us. the police 👮‍♀️ didn’t help even though we are classified as white. they said they have more important things to do like kill innocent black people and get away with it. they were saying some type of ritual which made my dear friend tom nook A REPUBLICAN. i had to get rid of a close mined friend like that. after having this app for 2 days it made me a different person. almost like a trump 🍊 supporter. i started yelling racial slurs when i see a person of color in public. i heard about this app on tiktok. i only wanted to show love to our big orange 🍊 racist god😔of a president but i guess not. this app is cursed just like the stale cheeto who designed it. don’t download this app or you’ll get possessed and it’ll ruin your life and for what? just to make the stale cheeto president for the next term? not worth it.
